ygData.subject: Our chance to make a difference
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if any of you visit EQ Casters (http://eq.castersrealm.com/), but if you do you probably know that it is EQ Enchanters after being redone to a
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if any of you visit EQ Casters
(http://eq.castersrealm.com/), but if you do you probably know that it
is EQ Enchanters after being redone to a general caster site. After
their resent Q&A with GZ I sent them an email:

>
>Well, I thought you have become an all-casters site, but judging by the
>latest Q&A with GZ, it is still EQ enchanters. No questions or answers
>about Wizards or Necromancers. I don't know whether you play any of
>those, but if you don't, it might be a good idea to get a staff member
>to represent each caster race as they seem to betaking second third and
>fourth places to Enchanters.
>
>Make no mistake, I am not telling you how to run your site, and these
>are not demands. I was just surprised that seemingly the only thing that
>changed about the site is the name and little more.
>

And here is the reply I got:

````
Well if you give me questions I will get them answered. Unfortunately
the
majority of the other classes are not very vocal, or organized in
formulating what they want to know.

- Baelish
````

So let's send them some Wizard questions and complaints and let our
voice be heard! I also advise sending them to Graffe
(http://www.graffe.com) as he seems to be the closest thing to a
representative that Wizards have.

--
Sergey
--

KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
